name: Squid Yes! Not So Octopus!
summary: Born of atomic death! Raised in the shadow of a mushroom cloud! He's a squid! Not an Octopus! He's Squid Yes! Not So Octopus! And he's very irritable. A classic single player, psychedelic, retro styled, arena shooter. The aim of the game is to score as close to 9 as possible whilst not succumbing to the invading masses.
